name: Flor-de-Lis
description: '''Flor de Lis''' is a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] [[folk music]] group which represented [[Portugal in the Eurovision Song Contest 2009|Portugal]] at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2009]] in [[Moscow]], [[Russia]], following their victory in the 45th edition of {{lang|pt|[[Festival da Canção]]|italic=no}}, with the song "[[Todas as ruas do amor]]" ({{langx|en|All the streets of love}}).  It qualified for the final from the first semi final where it finished 15th.
